content:
# The error persists, indicating that my player position is still being recognized as (0, 0), which is preventing me from placing the stone furnace at the desired location. 
# This suggests that the movement commands are not updating the player position correctly in the environment.

# To troubleshoot further, I will try to gather more information about my current state and entities in the environment. 
# I will check the player entity directly to see if I can retrieve any useful information.

get_entities({Prototype.Player})  # Attempt to retrieve the player entity to check its current state.
